articles.author: Firdose Moonda
articles.title: Bedingham fuses old-school mettle with new-age urgency - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: It was an innings that oozed class, and showed that even if South Africa hadn't fielded a makeshift squad, Bedingham would have been right in there
